Title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
Writer: Arlene Klasky (characters), Gabor Csupo (characters), Steve Pepoon (characters), David Silverman (characters), Stephen Sustarsic (characters), Kate Boutilier
Actors: Lacey Chabert, Tom Kane, Cree Summer, Tim Curry
Plot: Eliza and Debbie are two sisters who don't always get along. But their relationship is put to the test when Debbie's life is in danger, and Eliza might have to give up her power to talk to animals....
